name: IT Department
slogan: Building and maintaining the software technology of the department.
description: The IT Department is responsible for developing and maintaining all software products and internal tools. We focus on innovation, quality development, and efficiency in all our projects.
mission: To create innovative software solutions that solve real-world problems and exceed customer expectations.
vision: To be recognized as the industry leader in software development, known for our technical excellence and customer-focused approach.
goals: Deliver all projects on time and within budget
Maintain a high level of code quality and test coverage
Foster a culture of continuous learning and innovation

achievements.title: Successfully migrated legacy systems to cloud infrastructure
achievements.description: Completed the migration of all legacy systems to AWS, resulting in 40% cost reduction and improved performance.

achievements.title: Launched mobile application with 100,000+ downloads
achievements.description: Developed and launched the company's first mobile application, which reached 100,000 downloads in the first month.
